title: Wire up generated Chennai Spice seafood dish images (frontend assets + name-based resolution)

requirements.summary: Add 8 new 512x512 static seafood dish image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact required filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 image files exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames from Image Requirements.
Each image is 512x512 and visually represents the named dish (no generic placeholder-looking image).

requirements.summary: Update centralized dish-name-to-asset mapping so the 8 Chennai Spice seafood dish names resolve to the new generated image assets (including robust slash normalization).
acceptanceCriteria: When `getDishImageUrl(undefined, <dish name>)` is called for each of the 8 seafood dish names, it returns the corresponding new `/assets/generated/dish-*.dim_512x512.png` path.
The name normalization handles the slash in "Crab Masala/Nandu Kuzhambu" and "Kanava/Koonthal Masala" such that either full name resolves correctly.
The Restaurant Detail UI for Chennai Spice shows non-generic images for these 8 menu items (no `dish-generic` fallback for them under normal conditions).

file_operations.description: Replace the Chennai Spice seafood mappings currently pointing to the generic dish fallback with the new `/assets/generated/dish-*.dim_512x512.png` paths for: Chepala Pulusu, Prawn Ghee Roast, Crab Masala/Nandu Kuzhambu, Kanava/Koonthal Masala, Fish Mappas, Fish Kola Urundai, Chemmeen Biryani, Andhra Fish Fry. Also adjust `normalizeName()` to canonicalize slash formatting (e.g., collapsing optional spaces around '/') so full names containing slashes resolve consistently.
